summary: It’s surprisingly easy to use a pretrained model for Object Detection in Images or Videos.
title: Object Detection in Images and Videos using Python, OpenCV and YOLOv3

summary:
When combining TypeScript with React, some of the tutorials cannot be adapted that simple.
In this example I show how to use withRouter to manipulate the history in a functional React component.
title: Using withRouter in a TypeScript React Component

summary: Now that we have packaged an existing Spring Boot application into a Docker Image, we can deploy it to a Kubernet cluster as well.
title: Spring Boot Application in OpenShift / OKD
